item.title: eastasiasoft launches online store alongside American subsidiary
item.content:encoded:
Three PlayStation 5 titles now available for pre-order.

eastasiasoft has launched a American subsidiary, eastasiasoft of America, and an online store along with three new physical PlayStation 5 releases now available for pre-order, the company announced.

“The purpose of this store and company is to offer an expanded product lineup, which will initially focus on console releases but may soon expand to include PC physicals, branded merchandise and more depending on customer feedback, social media engagement and market demand,” eastasiasoft said in a press release.

The three titles available for pre-order are:

  • BIRDCAGE – Standard ($19.99) / Deluxe ($29.99)
  • Cute ’em Up Collection (Takotan and Exo-Calibre) – Standard ($19.99) / Deluxe ($29.99)
  • Maiden Cops – Standard ($19.99) / Deluxe ($29.99)

A bundle including all three Deluxe editions is also available for $84.99. Shipping is currently restricted to the United States, but individual games will continue to be made available internationally through ongoing partnerships with Play-Asia and other distributors.

item.title: Dollmare now available for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Feardemic and developer Almost Done Games have released horror game Dollmare for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch for $4.99, the companies announced.

Dollmare first launched for PC via Steam on October 24, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Feardemic:

About

You were desperate for money to pay the rent, so you’ve accepted a job offer at a doll factory. What seemed like a way to make an easy buck, turned out to be something much more sinister.

Inspect Anomalous Dolls

Carefully inspect each doll for strange defects and eerie behaviors. Spot every anomaly, from subtle flaws to unsettling movements, and ensure only the ‘safe’ dolls make it through.

Creepy Without Screamers

You will not be chased by monster. Nothing will scream or jump into your face. You don’t have to fight anyone or strive for resources.

At the same time, this is not a chill game. It’s still a horror game. You will feel scared, unease and oppressive feelings, like you’re being watched or something will happen to you. Something definitely will.

This game was made by developers who are too scared to play other horror games, so they made this.

Unique Playthroughs

In this horror game, every playthrough is slightly different. Many events in the game are not scripted, meaning that what you encounter is shaped by the moment.

No two players will experience the game the same way, ensuring that your journey is distinctly your own. Explore and uncover the factory’s secrets, where each moment keeps you guessing what will happen next.

During your work hours at the factory you will:

  • Inspect dolls for defects and anomalies.
  • Explore the dark and mysterious corners of the factory.
  • Maintain production equipment.
  • Follow strange protocols (just do, for your own safety).
  • Uncover the mystery behind the dolls and the factory.
  • Try not to lose your sanity and your life.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Cash Cleaner Simulator for PS5, Xbox Series launches February 12, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

The PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions of Cash Cleaner Simulator will launch on February 12, 2026, publishers Forklift Interactive and Digital Pajamas, and developer Mind Control Games announced.

Cash Cleaner Simulator first launched for PC via Steam on May 8.

Here is an overview of the game, via Forklift Interactive:

Cash Cleaner Simulator welcomes you into the life of a low-level criminal with a particular specialty. When your underworld contacts need dirty money to come back squeaky clean, they call you.

Each delivery is different. Arriving in bags, boxes, or stuffed into mattresses, it’s your job to retrieve it all, identify any problems like dirt, blood, or counterfeit bills, and get to work. Your clients expect results! Do your job well, or do whatever it takes, and reap the rewards.

In your downtime, order new tools to increase your efficiency, and scale up your operation. Or just buy stuff to cozy up your place!

Take on jobs at your own pace, expand your cleaning services to gold bars, different currencies, and more. Explore your lab…you may need more than just your eyes to discover its secrets. And maybe ask yourself how you got here…and why can’t you leave?

Use washing machines, dryers, counting machines, and other tools to clean dirty cash. After cleaning, don’t forget to count it and send it to your handlers! Maybe not all of it; the money pile doesn’t grow by itself! Progress through the jobs to upgrade your gear and unlock new ways to handle the money!

Your phone is the center of your operation. Surf the darknet to find new jobs, order useful (and not so) tools, take pictures, and scan your surroundings for helpful tips. Just put it on mute when you’re working. You don’t want any distractions!

All the satisfaction of having lots of money without any shootouts! Leave the danger to the others; you’re here to relax and clean the cash, and you don’t really care how it got here. Some paint the world red, but you paint it green! You know, like crisp clean bills!

Your place of work contains many secrets, so be on the lookout for them! You may need special tools like a UV lamp or wait for the night-time to come and find them, but the truth is out there… and so are more places to store your cash!

Everyone has to relax! Even those working with dirty cash obtained in questionable ways! Burn some cash figuratively and literally—cozy up your place, play Moneyball (it’s like basketball… BUT WITH CASH), and throw anything you want into a furnace for fun!

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Hitman: Absolution for Switch launches November 13
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Switch 2 version due out in 2026.

Feral Interactive will release IO Interactive-developed stealth action game Hitman: Absolution for Switch on November 13 for $29.99 / £19.99 / €24.99, the developer announced.

The Feral Interactive port first launched for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play on October 16, where it costs $14.99 / £9.99 / €12.49. A Switch 2 version is due out in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Feral Interactive:

Betrayed, hunted and honour-bound to protect a teenage girl with a dangerous secret, the ultimate assassin makes a deadly return to the Nintendo handheld. With a new list of targets, over 20 missions in which to eliminate them, and a new set of tricks up his sleeve, the barcoded killer’s stealth-action skills will be put to the test once more.

As with the recent mobile release, you can also expect Contracts Mode to arrive in a post-release update in 2026, when you’ll be able to set challenges and compete for high scores with your friends across all three platforms.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties details stories, battle styles, and ability upgrades
item.content:encoded:
Get the details below.

■ Yakuza 3 Kiwami

● Story: When the Peace is Shattered, the Dragon of Dojima Makes His Return

After the conflict with the Omi Alliance, Kazuma Kiryu entrusts the future of the Tojo Clan to Daigo Dojima and relocates to Okinawa with Haruka.

There, he runs Morning Glory, an orphanage connected to his foster father Shintaro Kazama, and spends his day in peace with his children… until that peace is disturbed by the looming threat of a government-backed resort development plan.

The orphanage is shaken by a struggle over vested interests, the Tojo Clan is embroiled in a fierce succession dispute, and a massive conspiracy with its roots deep in the political world begins to unravel. As all these forces converge, Kazuma Kiryu must face new conflicts in Okinawa and Tokyo head-on.

● Characters

Goro Majima (portrayed by Hidenari Ugaki)
Tojo Clan Lieutenant and Majima Family Patriarch

“With me, it’s hit hard or hit the bricks! And ain’t nobody tellin’ me what to do if they can’t bring the heat.”

Dubbed the Mad Dog of Shimano, his wild and unpredictable behavior strikes fear into friend and foe alike.

Majima’s obsession with Kiryu drives him to seek him out for brawls. Though he left the Tojo Clan to start his own construction company, Majima returns to the clan at Kiryu’s behest.

Yoshinobu Suzuki (portrayed by Michitaka Kobayashi)
Land, Infrastructure, and Transport Minister

“Then you must know I strive to better Okinawa’s standard of living. It is a responsibility I hold in the highest regard.”

Hoping to increase tourism to Okinawa, Suzuki endorses the luxury resort plan and opposes Minister of Defense Tamiya’s military expansion bill.

The Man in Black (portrayed by Charles Glover)

“This is the end of the line for you, Kazuma Kiryu!”

A man clad in a black coat who ambushes Kiryu. Everything about him is a complete enigma.

The Stranger (portrayed by Tetesuya Watari)

“I’ll see you again… in hell.”

A man who shot Daigo Dojima during a visit to Tojo Clan HQ. Bears great resemblance to the late Shintaro Kazama, Kiryu’s adopted father.

Both his objectives and identity remain a mystery.

● Battle

Dragon of Dojima: Kiwami Style

The ultimate evolution of the classic Dragon of Dojima style, featuring the most attack techniques in the series’ history. A bold, overwhelming brawler style that embodies the essence of Kazuma Kiryu’s iconic combat.

As always, Kiryu can pick up objects on the ground and transform them into powerful weapons!

—Heat Actions

The Dragon of Dojima: Kiwami Style gives Kiryu access to an arsenal of Heat Actions that make use of his bare-knuckle skills and the surrounding environment.

In addition to fan favorites from the original Yakuza 3, a host of brand-new Heat Abilities will also be at your disposal!

—Dragon Boost

Kiryu can power up by maxing out his gauge and activating his Dragon Boost. While in this state, he can dish out explosive finishers, including violent piledrivers and superhuman throws.

Use Kiryu’s Dragon Finisher to deliver a devastating final attack.

Ryukyu Style

A battle style rooted in Okinawan martial arts. Its base stance utilizes a tinbe and rochin, a traditional shield and short spear. Simply mash or hold down the buttons to weave in flashy sai, nichogama, tonfa, tekko, nunchaku, eiku, and surujin attacks.

Shield yourself from incoming bullets with the tinbe and turn the tide of battle!

—Heat Actions

The Ryukyu style also has access to highly technical Heat Actions incorporating Okinawan weaponry.

Certain Heat Actions can be seamlessly woven in after a standard combo. Throw a barrage of attacks and follow up with one of these techniques to decimate your foes!

—Dragon Boost

Kiryu can power up by maxing out his gauge and activating his Dragon Boost.

Activate this state while using Ryukyu Style to unlock the full potential of Kiryu’s weaponry. Launch sai as projectiles, hook enemies with nichogama, and send out an overwhelming Dragon Finisher!

Upgrading Abilities: Hone Yourself Through Training

Kiryu’s ability upgrades give him access to his most diverse skill set to date. Complete missions and undergo training to mold Kiryu as you see fit.

Yakuza Kiwami 3 also offers a new way to strengthen Kiryu. Customize his cell phone with straps and other accessories to boost his motivation, taking his abilities to new heights.

—Skill Tree

—Cell Phone Customization

■ Dark Ties

● Story: A Man Drawn into the Heart of the Underworld

The year is 2007. Yoshitaka Mine had once launched a successful startup, only to be stabbed in the back by a trusted partner.
Wandering Kaumorocho in a drunken stupor, he witnesses a gruesome conflict between yakuza factions. After watching a subordinate of Daigo Dojima sacrifice themselves, Mine longs to discover what makes a bond transcend material gain.

He approaches Tsuyoshi Kanda of the Tojo Clan’s Nishikiyama Family in hopes of learning more about Daigo. Kanda welcomes him in as his sworn brother and right-hand man. Working in tandem, they bring significant wealth into the family’s coffers.
Soon, the Tojo Clan catches wind of Mine and Kanda’s actions and springs into action. As Mine and Kanda navigate their way through this crisis, Mine begins to feel a sense of kinship toward Kanda.

As Mine ponders whether this is the unshakeable bond he’d been searching for, he receives a sudden invitation from Daigo Dojima.

● Battle

Battle Style: Stylish Shoot-Boxing Combat

Mine uses an elegant fighting style based on shoot-boxing. Exploit openings in your opponent’s defense to deliver refined combos and beat down enemies. Dash freely through the air to overwhelm foes with unpredictable movement.

Many of the techniques used by Mine in the original Yakuza 3 are also available. Unleash your inner villain and show no mercy!

—Dark Awakening

Mine builds up his Shackled Heart by attacking enemies and can spend it to trigger Dark Awakening, a mode that empowers Mine.

Using Dark Awakening, Mine drops his facade, revealing his true ferocity and transforming his battle animations and techniques. Go berserk, drag your opponent’s faces along the ground, and brutalize them with a storm of relentless strikes.

Let your dark side loose and go wild in battle!

—Heat Actions

Mine possesses many stylish, cold-blooded Heat Actions, including an all-out barrage to the face and a brutal gut punch. During Dark Awakening, his Heat Actions evolve. Channel Mine’s inner darkness and obliterate his enemies!

Upgrading Abilities: Unlocking Mine’s Callous Ferocity

Mine’s upgrades refine his combat abilities, improving his techniques and unlocking mid-air Heat Actions.

A number of upgrades to Dark Awakening are also available! Embolden Mine’s composure and ferocity and make quick work of your enemies!

—Skill Tree
